positions.subtitle: MaverixPro Limited
positions.description: - Designed and implemented indicators in Pinescript for technical analysis.- Enhanced strategies by optimization techniques.- Developed indicators and algorithms in Pinescript for strategy backtesting, including Alert Algorithms.- Developed an automated Entry and Exit Signals algorithm for seamless trading execution.
positions.title: Trading Bot Developer Internship
positions.description_html:
- Designed and implemented indicators in Pinescript for technical analysis.
- Enhanced strategies by optimization techniques.
- Developed indicators and algorithms in Pinescript for strategy backtesting, including Alert Algorithms.
- Developed an automated Entry and Exit Signals algorithm for seamless trading execution.

positions.subtitle: MaverixPro Limited
positions.description: - Crafted a Python-based live market stock screener scanning 142 F&O stocks from NSE, providing real-time identification of Bullish and Bearish stocks every five minutes. This facilitates informed intraday trading decisions aligned with specified strategies, leveraging five-minute data analysis.- Designed a Python-based stock screener analyzing 142 F&O stocks from NSE after market hours, generating bullish and bearish stock recommendations for the following day based on daily data and predefined strategies.
positions.title: Python Quantitative Developer Project
positions.description_html:
- Crafted a Python-based live market stock screener scanning 142 F&O stocks from NSE, providing real-time identification of Bullish and Bearish stocks every five minutes. This facilitates informed intraday trading decisions aligned with specified strategies, leveraging five-minute data analysis.

- Designed a Python-based stock screener analyzing 142 F&O stocks from NSE after market hours, generating bullish and bearish stock recommendations for the following day based on daily data and predefined strategies.
